location.name: Southern Red Sea Region
location.activity-description: Custodians and beneficiaries of the Protected Area System, pasturelands, forests, fishing grounds residing in: Semenawi and Debubawi Green Belts, Buri Peninsula, and Bera'sole Bay. These local communities will be participating in planning and management, especially identifying and implementing adapt

location.name: Northern Red Sea Region
location.activity-description: 1. Establishing protected area policy and institutional frameworks 2. Building capacity and experience for protected area management 3. Generation of SLM/SFM capacity required to restore/maintain ecosystem services to achieve protected are conservation objectives 4. Soil and water conservation meas

result.title: Objective
result.description: Create policy and institutional conditions to operationalize the national protected area system

indicator.title: Indicator 1
indicator.description: Total annual government financing for management and conservation of national protected area system.

target.comment:
Target: US$ 1,000,000/annual*
* cumulative for national PA administration and individual PA management

actual.comment: US$: 150,000 is the total annual government financing for management and conservation of national protected area system for the reporting year:

indicator.title: Indicator 2
indicator.description: Total hectares legally designated as a national protected area conforming to basic IUCN standards/categories

actual.comment:
Terrestrial: 0
Marine: 0
So far no legal protected area policy and institutional framework to operationalize national protected area systems has been prepared thus no legally designated national protected area has been established as no regulatory framework has been prepared yet. Formulation of this regulatory framework is planned to be initiated in the fourth quarter of 2015 and consultation is under way to facilitate the process.

indicator.title: Indicator 3
indicator.description: Total hectares of critical habitat conserved within newly established national protected areas.

baseline.comment:
Hectares of:
Native highland forest: 0
Native mangrove: 0
African wild ass habitat: 0
Turtle nesting sites: 0
Sea grass: 0

target.comment:
Hectares of:
Native highland forest: 55,000 Native mangrove: 12,000
African wild ass habitat: 80,000
Turtle nesting sites: 1300
Sea grass: 2,300

actual.comment: No progress. Conservation of critical habitat could not be implemented as so far no legal framework was formulated as indicated earlier.

result.title: Outcome 1
result.description: Establishment of protected area policy and institutional frameworks to operationalize national protected areas system

indicator.title: Indicator 1
indicator.description: National government law/proclamation legalizing the application of IUCN based designations for establishment of terrestrial and marine protected areas.

actual.comment:
Achievement todate: 0
No progress as formulation of the legal framework is not yet realized.

indicator.title: Indicator 2
indicator.description: Number of wildlife monitoring surveys/studies conducted and reported annually by protected area administration for key species and habitats within national protected areas.

baseline.comment:
Number of annual surveys, assessments, and reports for:
Wild ass: 0
Mangrove: 0
Land use/degradation: 0
Forest cover: 0
Turtle nests: 0
Water quantity/quality: 0
Marine fisheries: 0
Coral reef : 0
Sea grass: 0

target.comment:
Number of annual surveys, assessments, and reports for:
Wild ass: 7
Mangrove: 8
Land use/degradation:5
Forest cover: 7
Turtle nests: 7
Water quantity/quality: 7
Marine fisheries: 7
Coral reef : 7
Sea grass: 7

actual.comment:
No plan was made to conduct annual surveys, and assessments during the reporting year:
Wild ass: 0
Mangrove: 0
Land use/degradation: 0
Forest cover: 0
Turtle nests: 0
Water quantity/quality: 0
Marine fisheries: 0
Coral reef : 0
Sea grass: 0

indicator.title: Indicator 3
indicator.description: Number of trained professional staff employed full-time by the Government as part of the protected areas administration to manage the national protected area system.

indicator.title: Indicator 4
indicator.description: Number of national protected area conservation strategies and annual reports completed and updated by the national protected area administration(s).

indicator.title: Indicator 5
indicator.description: Number of Eritreans annually enrolled in national university accredited biodiversity conservation training course.

result.title: Outcome 2
result.description: Emplacement of management capacity and experience required operationalize national protected area system

indicator.title: Indicator 1
indicator.description: METT scores for at least three marine/terrestrial protected areas increase by 25%

baseline.comment:
METT Scores:
Semenawi and Debubawi Bahri: 29
Buri: 32
Bera’sole Bay: 22

target.comment:
METT Scores:
Semenawi and Debubawi Bahri: 80
Buri: 82
Bera’sole Bay: 71

actual.comment:
METT Scores: same as baseline condition as the project intervention is at early stage
Semenawi and Debubawi Bahri: 29
Buri: 32
Bera’sole Bay: 22

indicator.title: Indicator 2
indicator.description: Number of protected area management and business plans operational, assessed and updated by each protected area administration.

baseline.comment:
Semenawi and Debubawi Bahri: 0
Buri: 0
Bera’sole Bay: 0

target.comment:
Semenawi and Debubawi Bahri: 3
Buri: 3
Bera’sole Bay: 3

actual.comment:
Semenawi and Debubawi Bahri: 0
Buri: 0
Bera’sole Bay: 0
There was no plan to do so this reporting year.

indicator.title: Indicator 3
indicator.description: Number of trained professional staff employed full-time by the Government to manage individual protected areas.

baseline.comment:
Semenawi and Debubawi Bahri: 0
Buri: 0
Bera’sole Bay: 0

target.comment:
Semenawi and Debubawi Bahri: 10
Buri: 15
Bera’sole Bay: 5

actual.comment:
Semenawi and Debubawi Bahri: 1
Buri:2
Bera’sole Bay: 1

indicator.title: Indicator 4
indicator.description: Individual protected areas receive annual financial support adequate to implement PA management plan priorities and conserve globally significant species.

baseline.comment:
Total annual government PA budget:
Semenawi and Debubawi Bahri: 0
Buri: 0
Bera’sole Bay: 0

target.comment:
Total annual government PA budget:
Semenawi and Debubawi Bahri: US$ 250,000
Buri: US$ 300,000
Bera’sole Bay: US$ 100,000

actual.comment:
Semenawi and Debubawi Bahri: US$ 90,000
Buri: US$ 50,000
Bera’sole Bay: US$ 10,000

result.title: Outcome 3
result.description: Generation of SLM/SFM capacity required to support national system of protected areas

indicator.title: Indicator 1
indicator.description: Number of project area residents who are participating members of farm/fisheries field (FFS) schools.

actual.comment:
Men: 0
Women: 0
No farm/fisheries field (FFS) schools have yet been establised.

indicator.title: Indicator 2
indicator.description: Number of FFS participant households and women reporting increased levels of food security.

actual.comment: No FFS households and FFS women groups have been established yet.

indicator.title: Indicator 3
indicator.description: Number of farm and fishing field school participants adopting ecosystem conservation practices as detailed in the community ecosystem services conservation plans.

actual.comment: Achievement todate: 0; as no community ecosystem services conservation plans have been prepared as of yet.

indicator.title: Indicator 4
indicator.description: Total hectares of native forest cover within the Green Belt.

actual.comment: mapping and zoning within the protected area are not yet started; no measurement of forest cover has been conducted yet, and plantation of seedlings is to be done during this rainy season (July-August, 2015).

indicator.title: Indicator 5
indicator.description: Surface water quality/quantity of main upland streams improved to more closely meet needs of natural ecosystem function.

baseline.comment: Water quality/quantity target sites and baseline standards TBD at inception

target.comment: Water quality/quantity target sites and standards TBD at inception.

actual.comment: Not initiated yet but equipment and materials for the activity have been identified and procurement plan is in place and is planned to be implemented before the end of 2015.

indicator.title: Indicator 6
indicator.description: Total number of grazing species found within project’s coastal areas.

baseline.comment:
Numbers of:
African wild ass: ˜ 200
Dorcas Gazelle: TBD
Soemmoring Gazelle: TBD

target.comment:
Numbers of:
African wild ass: ˜ 250
Dorcas Gazelle: TBD
Soemmoring Gazelle: TBD

actual.comment: No surveys have been conducted yet; conditions are assumed to be same as baseline conditions:
